mapper.select: SELECT thq.HQ_OFFICE_CD, thq.HQ_OFFICE_NM, tms.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, tms.CLS_FG, tcm_cls_fg.NMCODE_NM AS CLS_FG_NM, tms.SYS_STAT_FG, tcm_sys_stat_fg.NMCODE_NM AS SYS_STAT_FG_NM, tms.OWNER_NM, tms.TEL_NO, tme.MP_NO, tca.AGENCY_NM, tms.SYS_OPEN_DATE, tms.SYS_CLOSURE_DATE FROM TB_MS_STORE tms LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_HQ_OFFICE thq ON tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = thq.HQ_OFFICE_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM_AGENCY tca ON tms.AGENCY_CD = tca.AGENCY_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MS_EMPLOYEE tme ON tms.STORE_CD = tme.STORE_CD AND tme.EMP_NO = '0000' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM_NMCODE tcm_cls_fg ON tms.CLS_FG = tcm_cls_fg.NMCODE_CD AND tcm_cls_fg.NMCODE_GRP_CD = '003' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM_NMCODE tcm_sys_stat_fg ON tms.CLS_FG = tcm_sys_stat_fg.NMCODE_CD AND tcm_sys_stat_fg.NMCODE_GRP_CD = '009'

SELECT COUNT(RESRCE_CD) AS CNT FROM TB_WB_RESRCE_INFO WHERE RESRCE_CD IN ( SELECT RESRCE_CD FROM TB_WB_AUTHOR_GRP_RESRCE WHERE AUTH_GRP_CD = ( SELECT AUTH_GRP_CD FROM TB_WB_USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ) AND RESRCE_CD = '000419' AND USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT RESRCE_CD FROM TB_WB_AUTHOR_EXCEPT WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND RESRCE_CD = '000419' AND INCLD_EXCLD_FG = 'I' AND USE_YN = 'Y' )
